tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE PerformanceMetrics (
    id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    metric_name VARCHAR,
    value DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE TrendAnalysis (
    id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    analysis_type VARCHAR,
    trend VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE PatternIdentification (
    id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    pattern_name VARCHAR,
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE PerformanceHistory (
    id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    metric_name VARCHAR,
    value DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE PerformanceTrends (
    id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    trend_type VARCHAR,
    trend_description TEXT
)
